html:
4.19.21  7:34 pm   Hey Bill! When you write songs do you think out the form in advance or do you just start writing and let the parts show up where they do? 

      i don't plan the form. i've tried that before, which is ok, but the best part is when i break the plan

4.19.21  7:34 pm   have you received any formal music training?

     was able to steal a bit

      and, more importantly, is formal music training worth the paper it's written on?

      for music to work well, you're probably going to have to get somewhat loose with it. otherwise you'd never know when to stop playing 1 note, or else maybe you'd just always be playing someone else's music

4.19.21  7:27 pm   Hi Bill, as a musician who struggles with doubt and self esteem, do you ever suffer from those musically?

     yes

     And if so how do you overcome them?

     be patient

4.19.21  7:22 pm   how epic is music?

      i dare you to test its limits

4.19.21  7:06 pm   how do you feel about earth?

      such an interesting shape

4.19.21  7:04 pm   In your song got some money, you mention that money is bad, why do you think that?

      not everything i write into a song is what i think. songs are a fantastic playground to explore different ideas, role play, etc

4.19.21  6:56 pm   what is the internet

      a way to go so far onto the computer that you actually go way off the computer

4.19.21  6:55 pm   i'm afraid of bear puppets and have begun seeing them around corners. what should i do?

      you could get some sort of insurance policy

4.19.21  6:53 pm   thoughts on frogs?

      a bit jumpy

4.19.21  6:48 pm   Is the house with the mountains behind it at 2:34 in got some money the same house with the mountains behind it in hi I'm Steve?

      no

4.19.21  6:42 pm   opinions on biscuits

      most of them are quite firm

4.19.21  6:37 pm   why many of your song contains the word "song" in the lyrics?

     after discussing it with my therapist, who also happens to be me, we've determined that i like songs very much and fixate on them

4.19.21  6:37 pm   is "got some money" the song you said you were excited about writing recently

      i'm excited about writing every song

4.19.21  6:35 pm   What inspired you to use more grey in your latest video?

      using too many colors for every other video

4.19.21  6:29 pm   What have you been thinking about this week? 

      new songs

4.19.21  6:23 pm   what was the hardest song that you have ever made both video wise and music wise?

      the hardest video for a song so far was probably i'm a princess. the hardest song recording so far was probably "hello sexy pants". it didn't have to be hard, i just worked really hard on it

4.19.21  6:22 pm   Have computers enslaved humanity?

      humanity has enslaved computers, for sure

4.19.21  6:18 pm   What is your way of destroying depression?

      travel

4.19.21  6:18 pm   what is the time signature at the end of your recent song "got some money"? i have been trying to figure it out since you released it earlier

      alternating 4 and 5. or you can call it 9, if you don't mind your bars being enormous

4.19.21  6:14 pm   the new video has a different vibe. did anything change?

      yes. i've come to my senses

4.19.21  6:12 pm   for "got some money" it seems like the first half of the video is 2d and the last half is 3d. did you make the first half long time ago?

      no. it was actually most of the 3D stuff that was made before, up to a year ago

4.19.21  6:10 pm   How can i be cool?

      that's easy. simply begin wearing your trousers at a different angle

4.19.21  5:49 pm   Is "got some money" the song about wistfulness, listlessness, and wishfulness?

      no, that was "i'm a princess"

4.19.21  5:51 pm   what time signature is get some money in?

      4, except the end

4.19.21  5:45 pm   Will you go back to more 2D styled videos?

      yes

4.19.21  5:45 pm   Why are you so cool?

      that's because of how many times i've read the best practices handbook

4.19.21  5:44 pm   how do you thing?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.19.21  5:44 pm   what font do you use on your music clips?

      regular

4.19.21  5:41 pm   How to music???

      impossible. it can't be done

4.19.21  5:25 pm   what is your opinion on capitalism?

      it's like going to the store, except the whole world is the store

4.19.21  5:12 pm   what inspired your unique style of editing?

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

4.19.21  5:05 pm   What inspired to write your new song?

      the same thing that inspires me to write all my songs, which is that i love songs and i think they are a powerful artistic communication device

4.19.21  5:03 pm   dude are you a genius, you figured out how to solve the videos taking too long problem, just make youtube show everyone a release date, then you cant go back on it!!

      youtube only showed the release date 1 hour in advance. that's not even enough time to render a video

4.19.21  4:59 pm   got some money! beautiful song. The curve ball i didn't know was possible and yet i clearly craved so deeply. Have you chosen the next one?

      i'm supposed to make a final decision by tomorrow at noon

4.19.21  4:59 pm   did you actually write about wednesday 2 or 3 songs before you wrote that line in got some money?

      no

4.19.21  4:59 pm   are you gonna release an album?

      i'm gonna release the songs individually. which is good news if you like songs because it's definitely gonna be more songs than albums have

4.19.21  4:57 pm   how many songs are options for the next youtube upload?

     i've narrowed it down to 24

     (also cool new song)

4.19.21  4:53 pm   i like the mix of 2d and 3d in got some money. Will we be seeing more of that as opposed to strictly 3d?

      any way i can get the job done

4.19.21  4:50 pm   Do you know where my last brain cell is?

      the brain cells don't go in order

4.19.21  4:33 pm   What's your opinion on french people?

      sometimes it just blows my mind how french they are

4.19.21  4:30 pm   Are you a self taught musician?

      yes but i've been influenced heavily by some of the world around me

4.19.21  4:30 pm   How do you come up with song lyrics?

      musically

4.19.21  4:27 pm   today is april 19th 2021. did this information come as a surprise to anyone?

      i think so

4.19.21  4:15 pm   What is time?

      it's you

4.19.21  4:06 pm   why did you decide to do a premiere ??!

      why not

4.19.21  4:05 pm   Would you be interested in making a full documentary on Velcro?

      i will leave that to the experts

4.19.21  3:44 pm   What did you mean when you said the new video was gonna come out tomorrow on 4.17.21?

      i actually said that on 4/18 and what i meant was that it would come out on 4/19

4.19.21  3:43 pm   will you ever start doing anagrams again

      i usually do them in bed

4.19.21  3:19 pm   Do you really want your song to be released on 4/20?

      no

4.19.21  3:18 pm   do you think theres life on other planets

      yes but it can happen fast
